function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncontrolled situation in children's homes leading to increased risk of contagion","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 spread and transmission among children and parents","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures and monitoring in children's homes","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Children, parents, caregivers","Owner":"Government, childcare organizations"},{"Description":"Cross-regional spread of infections due to schools and childcare","Impact":"Increase in COVID-19 cases across different regions","Mitigation":"Conduct careful analysis of cross-regional infection spread, implement targeted intervention strategies","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, contact tracing apps","People":"Students, parents, teachers, community members","Owner":"Health authorities, education departments"},{"Description":"Nursing homes as hotspots of COVID-19 dissemination","Impact":"High risk of COVID-19 transmission among elderly residents and employees","Mitigation":"Strict infection control measures, regular testing of residents and employees","Technologies":"Infection control software, testing equipment","People":"Elderly residents, care employees","Owner":"Nursing home management, healthcare authorities"}]}
